thread.title: You Know It's Bad When You've Lost Fox News
thread.title_full: You Know It's Bad When You've Lost Fox News | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: You Know It's Bad When You've Lost Fox News
text:
HOLY SHIT!
The Donald Trump administration is about 56 hours into its work, and yet it's already been completely derailed by press conferences of its own doing … and now, it looks like the administration has lost their only media backer!!
Related: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA 
FOX News host Chris Wallace , speaking on FOX News Sunday with Trump's Chief of Staff Reince Priebus , just totally torched The Donald and his administration earlier today, and you MUST see it (above)!!!
Truly incredible stuff — the Trump folks have even lost FOX News with blatant and absurd lies and a lack of focus on being presidential .
And we haven't even gotten to Trump's first full week as President.
THIS. IS. COMPLETELY. BONKERS. 
Tags: chris wallace , donald trump , fox news , fox news sunday , politik , reince priebus , tv news , viral: news
